de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.edgeDetector

Class Kernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.edgeDetector.Kernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Descriptor, FeatureDescriptor

    public class Kernel
extends java.lang.Object
implements FeatureDescriptor
    Performs convolution with a given Kernel directly on this image. Basiacally it is just a wrapper for ImageJ's ImageProcessor.convolve(). Predefined masks are SOBEL, SCHARR, PREWITT
    See Also:
    ImageProcessor.convolve(float[], int, int)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.Descriptor

        public java.util.List<double[]> getFeatures()

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        public void addPropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: Descriptor
        Adds a change listener to this descriptor. The descriptor might fire status change events which can be used to track the progress. Keep in mind that no implementation is forced to fire any events at all.
